title: Cucumber Mint 🍃Salad 🥗  || Starter || Healthy Diet
content:
Salad : Starter / appetizer Servings: 4 Duration: 10 mins Salad is a healthy and nutrition bowl where you can eat at any time in a day. You can make your own salad bowl it can be with veggies or quinoa or beans or fruits to enhance the flavor of salad add little pepper & salt. Any body can make any kind of salad because they are very easy to prepare with less ingredients & in less time. Salad can be mixed veggies or fruits or beans it’s all your choice and make out best combination for healthy salad 🥗 One full bowl of salad makes your stomach full because it contains high nutrition values. These salad’s suites to any age group & it’s super yummy 😋 Today I prepared Cucumber salad with yogurt dressing Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Mini Cucumber - 4 - peeled off - chopped
  • Tomato 🍅 - 1 - medium - seedless - finely chopped
  • Red Onion - 1/4 - thinly sliced
  • Mint leaves - 10 - medium sized - finely chopped
Dressing:
  • Fresh curd / yogurt - 120 ml
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Sugar - 1/2 tsp
  • Red Paprika - 1/2 tsp
Procedure:
  • Add all chopped vegetables and mint leaves in a large bowl
  • Mix well
  • For dressing in a bowl of curd add salt, sugar and Paprika
  • Mix well and add dressing on vegetables
  • Mix well
  • Serve as a starter / evening salad 🥗
  • Happy Cooking and Enjoy your day 🙂
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust Spices according to taste
  • If you don't like Paprika you can avoid
  • To bring strong flavor of mint you can use mint Paste instead of mint leaves
  • Don't use more Onions in salad.. it spoils the taste of salad 🥗
